description: Establishes comprehensive harvest crew good agricultural practices requirements including general food safety program oversight, inspection protocols, training programs, worker hygiene facilities and practices, harvest operations, post-harvest treatments, transportation and tracking, and on-site storage. Aligned with official PrimusGFS v4.0 Checklist Module 4 (Sections 4.01-4.08).
scope: All harvest crew operations including worker hygiene, training, facilities, field inspections, harvest practices, post-harvest treatments, transportation, tracking, and on-site storage for operations within the organization's scope

sections.title: Title & Document Control
sections.contentGuidance: Document identification (number, title, version, dates), approval signatures, distribution list

sections.title: Purpose / Objective
sections.contentGuidance: Why this document exists, what it achieves for harvest crew operations, business and compliance drivers

sections.title: Scope
sections.contentGuidance: What harvest operations/areas covered, who is responsible, any exclusions or limitations

sections.title: Definitions & Abbreviations
sections.contentGuidance: Minimum 5-8 relevant technical terms, harvest-specific terminology, GAP acronyms

sections.title: Roles & Responsibilities
sections.contentGuidance: Specific positions with clearly defined harvest duties, authority levels, and accountability for food safety

sections.title: Prerequisites & Reference Documents
sections.contentGuidance: Related SOPs, standards (Primus GFS, FSMA PSR), regulatory requirements, training prerequisites

sections.title: Hazard / Risk Analysis
sections.contentGuidance: Harvest-specific hazards (contamination, hygiene failures, environmental risks), risk assessment, control measures

sections.title: Procedures
sections.contentGuidance: Detailed step-by-step harvest procedures (minimum 8-12 steps), inspection protocols, hygiene practices, specific frequencies

sections.title: Monitoring Plan
sections.contentGuidance: What to monitor in harvest operations, how often, who is responsible, what records to keep, acceptance criteria

sections.title: Verification & Validation Activities
sections.contentGuidance: How to verify harvest procedures are followed, validation that procedures are effective, audit/review frequency

sections.title: Corrective & Preventive Action (CAPA) Protocol
sections.contentGuidance: Triggers for CAPA in harvest operations, investigation steps, containment, root cause analysis, corrective actions, preventive measures

sections.title: Traceability & Recall Elements
sections.contentGuidance: Harvest documentation traceability, record linkages, lot/batch identification, harvest crew traceability

sections.title: Record Retention & Document Control
sections.contentGuidance: What harvest records are generated, retention periods, storage location, access control

sections.title: Compliance Crosswalk
sections.contentGuidance: Table mapping Primus Code | Requirement | Document Section | Evidence

sections.title: Revision History & Approval Signatures
sections.contentGuidance: Revision table (version, date, description) and signature lines (Prepared By, Reviewed By, Approved By)
